sqlMap.select:
SELECT attrtype, attrid, attrname, attrvalue, valuetype, profileid, vendorid FROM
(select top $pageSize$ * from otppms_attrinfo where attrtype not in
(select top $startRow$ attrtype from otppms_attrinfo order by attrtype ASC ) order by attrtype ASC ) otppms_attrinfo where 1=1
ORDER BY attrtype ASC
